WRITING.TITLE: Miz has come so far from the original Tough enough
WRITING.TEXT:
I was rewatching the TE wrestling with wregret and it had clips of pre wwe miz. Hes so much like so many of us. Dude just loved wwe. Had lots of merchandise and wwe stuff in his room. You could tell the guy had so much passion for wwe.
Its a travesty the fans voted for pruder over miz. But it worked out for the best in the end.
The miz just seems like he would be an awesome dude to be friends with.
For every cena who was born with a lot and was physically athletically gifted and gets the hot chick, i much prefer guys like miz, who transcended his limitations physically with just charisma, passion and never giving up.
And although a tiny part of me is jelly maryse is so gorgeous, a bigger part of me is so happy for them both. They are so in love. You can feel it. That recent tarantoola clip melted even my black heart.
Just so happy to see the guy succeed.
Once again fuck JBl and Benoit for making the guys life hell. Im glad he came out on top
You just said you liked jrpgs though
Sure if your taste is shit
It wasnt bullshit, that money should go to the NHS and our struggling systems than the Masters in Brussells

He said it SHOULD go to NHS. Which it really should.
Thats not a guarentee

not counting the tell tale game, which i enjoy but want a more traditional experience

WRITING.TITLE: Whatever happened to overkills walking dead game?
WRITING.TEXT:
Im not a huge fan of overkill. Not only do i not find payday particularly good, but they seem super shady how they deal with dlc and customers.
That said, I was intrigued by the prospect of another fps walking dead game. For all its flaws. I actually did enjoy survival instinct.
But theres been nothing on this in a long time.

As much as I do really enjoy their walking dead and other games, I really would prefer a more traditional walking dead game now. And a guardians game would have been brilliant as a co op third person game.
Overall though, the Miz is better. For me a wrestler has to have it all. And i find the Miz more compelling to watch and entertaining. His promos truly invest you in whatever he does.
The Witcher 3 deserves it. By far and away the best RPG ever. Not only that, one of the best games ever period.

I enjoyed their recent efforts, but as the other dude says, they need to try something new. Like a game of thrones game should feel nothing like guardians or walking dead. As much as I do enjoy them, its very close to being played out. And theres no excuse for major bugs and hick ups on a comparatively simple game engine
If they are trying to beat your ass and steal your stuff? Gets same treatment as any thief
Ughh no. Miz is better overall.
Fuck benoit
Amazing. I hope they wont hurt her when they grow
Dear god. Hes too adorable. It shouldnt be legal to be so cute
I really hate the over complicated easter egg style.
LOL i cant even be jelly miz has a hot wife. What a great couple. Im so happy miz didnt let the miserable fucktard antics of jbl ruin him.

I really didnt like it. Felt like a shoddy version of ultimate alliance

And even if you saved her in the end, it caused so much death and misery and from what we have learned she will end up dying anyway, probably.
